ComicInfo.Summary: When a young girl, wielding incredible power, is tormented by inanimate objects, it is left up to the outcast magician to convince the Disciples that she is a vessel for a much greater force. His pleas fall on deaf ears and compel him into action on a course of no return. Just how much is he willing to sacrifice in order to prove his worth? And just how far will the other Disciples let him?
